title: In Love and law (Captioned)
creator_credit: Film Australia, Noel Price and Pip Karmel
brief_description: This video contains a series of three short episodes which examine issues that arise as a result of separation and divorce and offers advice on resolving conflict through counselling. Episode 1. “Calling it a day”, episode 2. “Baby makes three” and episode 3. “House and home”.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Noel Price and Pip Karmel
